achievements: Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress for her role in Goodfellas (1990)
Emmy Award nomination for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Drama Series for her role in The Sopranos (1999-2007)
Long-standing host of breakfast television shows in the UK, including GMTV and Lorraine.
First African-American female playwright to have a play performed on Broadway (A Raisin in the Sun, 1959)
Received the New York Drama Critics' Circle Award for Best Play for A Raisin in the Sun
